Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • Station

  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a Snake Oil gas station.
    Version:
    Winter 2019.
    Author:
    Doyt Perry.

      • Station

        public Station(java.lang.String inDescription,
               double inLatitude,
               double inLongitude,
               double inPrice)
        Second constructor for objects of class Station.
        Parameters:
        inDescription - String description of station.
        inLatitude - double distance in degrees from equator.
        inLongitude - double distance in degrees from prime meridian.
        inPrice - double price per gallon.

    • Method Detail

      • calcDistance

        public double calcDistance(double targLatitude,
                           double targLongitude)
        Calculates approximate distance between the input location and that of this station. 
        NOTE: 
    The calculation here is very rough (the accuracy
    is estimated to be within 10%); this will need to
    be improved in the future
        Parameters:
        targLatitude - latitude of target location.
        targLongitude - longitude of target location.
        Returns:
        double distance in miles.

      • calcPricePerGGE

        public double calcPricePerGGE()
        Calculates price per GGE (gasoline gallon equivalent) of fuel at this station.
        Returns:
        double price per gge.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns Station information in specifed format. 
        Format of the string should be
      description [latitude, longitude] price: $price
 Example: Cobra Gas [39.9571, 82.81] price: $2.13
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String formatted with Station info
